mapper.update: update student_profession set job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_info = #{jobInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary1 = #{salary1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary2 = #{salary2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary3 = #{salary3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hover_info = #{hoverInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, job, job_info, salary1, salary2, salary3, hover_info, create_at, update_at from student_profession
